markdownRemark.html:
Eu só quero estar no teu pensamento, dentro dos teus sonhos, e no teu olhar. Tenho que te amar só com o meu silêncio, num só pedacinho de mim. Eu daria tudo pra tocar você, tudo pra te amar uma vez. Já me conformei, vivo de imaginação, só não posso mais esconder... Eu tenho inveja do sol que pode te aquecer, eu tenho inveja do vento que te toca. Tenho ciúme de quem pode amar você, quem pode ter você pra sempre.

Faith-Seeker

When I prayed for some answers
I was answered with more questions
Trying to figure out how to react
From the day I got my first lesson

I wanted the one to find their way through
To help me understand the reasons
Somehow, I got something even better
But at the same time, race conditions

Fate wants to make me a believer
It got me more than what I needed
Fate wants to make me a believer
It got me more than what I needed

It got me more than what I needed

Being really honest, I don't think I'd ever have ever this kind of attention, I might just always focus.

I don't like your little games, don't like your tilted stage.
